title: Kha'zix jungle?
body: Is kha'zix any good at jungle in the pre season? I miss playing him jungle :( If so what is the correct jungle route for him?

replies.body: top side start gromp(smite) take blue then wolves, b you should have around 420 gold, get your jungle item (i prefer stallkers for clear and cd) clear red side then gank you should have enough gold from a successful gank should get you 3 long swords and some wards and you should be set

Blue Side: Start Golems -> Blue -> Red -> Recall
Red Side: Gromp -> Blue -> Red -> Recall

Same for nearly every jungler.

thats just trash.

kha is an AA reliant jungler with Q AA resets. i think Q even procs the krugs passive.
always try to start krugs.
start with W and max W and evo W. you can clear the jungle and gank with 70% HP if you do it properly.
i go krugs(S) red blue(S) gromp wolves raptors(S) and gank with the raptor buff, usually mid lane.
if you cant start krugs, you go gromp blue wolves B, red and gank. you are behind in xp but should be able to pull off a decent gank/countergank.

warrior enchant ofc, i like to go chilling smite or trailblazer into 4 long swords and finish boots. gives a really strong 1 vs 1 or gank potential till around lvl 9, then you go back for finished jungle item and a 2nd brut or tiamat depending on how the game is going.

a semi rushed ohmwrecker is also good for tower diving. banner of command increases W heal and gives across map pressure. im starting some testing on righteous glory and seeing if it fits into a build.

this is for a zoning teamfight kha, not really assassin kha. warmogs is also good.
